name: display sentiment
define values required for adding trade to portfolio
func:
// create a unique algo_id with current unixtime
let d = Date.now()

msg.id = flow.get("id")
msg.ticker = flow.get("symbol")
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.asset_class = flow.get("asset_class")
msg.account = flow.get("account")
msg.psize = flow.get("psize")
msg.status = flow.get("status")
msg.algo_type = flow.get("algo_type")
msg.benchmark = flow.get("benchmark")
return msg;

name: delete from tickers
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.ticker
let portfolioname = msg.algo_name
msg.query = "delete from tickers_" +msg.account+ " where symbol like '" +symbol+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: delete existing algo
func:
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.query = "delete from algos where algo_name = '" +msg.algo_name+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: insert into tickers_paper
func:
let id = msg.id
let symbol = msg.symbol
let portfolioname = msg.algo_name
msg.query = "insert into tickers_" +msg.account+ " (id, symbol, portfolioname) values (" + id + ",'" + symbol + "', '" + portfolioname + "') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
node.warn(msg.query)
msg.symbol = symbol
return msg;

name: add values to algos table
func:
let id = msg.id
let ticker = msg.tickers
let algo_name = msg.algo_name
let login = msg.login
let asset_class = msg.asset_class
let number = msg.number
let target = msg.target
let account = msg.account
let psize = msg.psize
let algo_type = msg.algo_type
let status = msg.status
let benchmark = msg.benchmark

let benchmark_start = global.get("spy_current")

let sql = "insert into algos (id,account,algo_name,algo_type,status,portfolio_size,benchmark,benchmark_start) values "
sql += "('" + id + "','" + account + "','" + algo_name + "','" + algo_type + "','" + status + "','" + psize + "','" + benchmark + "','" + benchmark_start + "') ON CONFLICT DO NOTHING;"
msg.query = sql
node.warn(msg.query)

return msg;

name: Define Trading Values
func:
// Define all values below

// create a unique algo id from Unixtime
let d = Date.now()

flow.set("symbol", "IWB") // iShares Russell 1000 ETF
flow.set("cnt", 1) // number of trades to return from Polygon
flow.set("timespan", "minute")
flow.set("id", d)
flow.set("algo_name", "Trade on News Sentiment Daily [paper]")
flow.set("psize", "250000")
flow.set("account", "paper") // live or paper
flow.set("size", 1000) // number of shares to trade
flow.set("asset_class", 'stocks') // stocks or cryptos
flow.set("status", "running") 
flow.set("algo_type", "interday") // interday or intraday 
flow.set("benchmark", "SPY") // typically SPY 

return msg;

name: Retrieve Flow Variables
func:
msg.id = flow.get("id")
msg.symbol = flow.get("symbol")
msg.cnt = flow.get("cnt")
msg.timespan = flow.get("timespan")
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.psize = flow.get("psize")
msg.size = flow.get("size")
msg.account = flow.get("account")


node.warn("ID: " +msg.id+ " Symbol: " +msg.symbol+  " Count: "  +msg.cnt+ " Timespan: " +msg.timespan+ " Algo Name:" +msg.algo_name+ " Portfolio Size: " +msg.psize+ " Shares: " +msg.size)
return msg;

name: Buy or  Short at market open based on news sent
trade long or short
prepare Positions query
close positions (single ticker)
func:
let id = msg.payload["id"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let exchange = msg.payload["exchange"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let asset_marginable = msg.payload["asset_marginable"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
let avg_entry_price = msg.payload["avg_entry_price"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let market_value = msg.payload["market_value"]
let cost_basis = msg.payload["cost_basis"]
let unrealized_pl = msg.payload["unrealized_pl"]
let unrealized_plpc = msg.payload["unrealized_plpc"]
let unrealized_intraday_pl = msg.payload["unrealized_intraday_pl"]
let unrealized_intraday_plpc = msg.payload["unrealized_intraday_plpc"]
let current_price = msg.payload["current_price"]
let lastday_price = msg.payload["lastday_price"]
let change_today = msg.payload["change_today"]
let qty_available = msg.payload["qty_available"]

node.warn("Ticker: " + symbol + " Price: " + current_price + " Profit: " + unrealized_pl + " Qty: " + qty)

// create a unique clientid with unixtime
let d = Date.now()
let client_order_id = symbol + d



let temp = ''
let action = 'sell'
if ( qty < 0){ qty = (qty * -1)
action = 'buy'
}
temp = {
        "symbol": symbol,
        "qty": qty,
        "side": action,
        "type": 'market',
        "client_order_id": client_order_id,
 //       "limit_price": price,  // limit orders only
        //    "subtag": subtag,
        "time_in_force": "gtc"
    }; 

node.warn(temp)

return msg;

name: update order_confirms with complete orders
update id, algo_name
func:
msg.id = flow.get("id")
msg.algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
msg.query = "update order_confirms set algo_id = " +msg.id+ ", algo_name = '" +msg.algo_name+ "' where subtag = '" +msg.algo_name+ "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: update names in positions
func:
msg.query = "update positions set portfolioname = tickers_paper.portfolioname, id = tickers_paper.id, name = tickers_paper.name FROM tickers_paper where tickers_paper.symbol = positions.symbol"
return msg;

name: display order response
func:
let algo_name = flow.get("algo_name")
let algo_id = flow.get("id")

let id = msg.payload["id"]
let client_order_id = msg.payload["client_order_id"]
let created_at = msg.payload["created_at"]
let updated_at = msg.payload["updated_at"]
let submitted_at = msg.payload["submitted_at"]
let filled_at = msg.payload["filled_at"]
let expired_at = msg.payload["expired_at"]
let canceled_at = msg.payload["canceled_at"]
let failed_at = msg.payload["failed_at"]
let replaced_at = msg.payload["replaced_at"]
let replaced_by = msg.payload["replaced_by"]
let replaces = msg.payload["replaces"]
let asset_id = msg.payload["asset_id"]
let symbol = msg.payload["symbol"]
let asset_class = msg.payload["asset_class"]
let notional = msg.payload["notional"]
let qty = msg.payload["qty"]
let filled_qty = msg.payload["filled_qty"]
let filled_avg_price = msg.payload["filled_avg_price"]
let order_class = msg.payload["order_class"]
let order_type = msg.payload["order_type"]
let type = msg.payload["type"]
let side = msg.payload["side"]
let time_in_force = msg.payload["time_in_force"]
let limit_price = msg.payload["limit_price"]
let stop_price = msg.payload["stop_price"]
let status = msg.payload["status"]
let extended_hours = msg.payload["extended_hours"]
let legs = msg.payload["legs"]
let trail_percent = msg.payload["trail_percent"]
let trail_price = msg.payload["trail_price"]
let hwm = msg.payload["hwm"]
let subtag = msg.payload["subtag"]
let source = msg.payload["source"]

subtag = flow.get("algo_name")
if ( subtag == null){ subtag = ''}

if ( source == null) { source = 0}
if (limit_price == null) { limit_price = 0 }
let result = symbol.includes("/");
if (result == true) {
    symbol = symbol.replace("/","")
}

if ( limit_price == null){ limit_price = 0}
if ( stop_price == null){ stop_price = 0}

msg.query = "insert into order_confirms (id, client_order_id, created_at, updated_at, submitted_at, asset_id, symbol, asset_class, qty, order_type, type, side, time_in_force, limit_price, stop_price, status, extended_hours, subtag, algo_id, algo_name) values "
msg.query += "('" + id + "','" + client_order_id + "','" + created_at + "','" + updated_at + "','" + submitted_at + "','" + asset_id + "','" + symbol + "','" + asset_class + "','" + qty + "','" + order_type + "','" + type + "','" + side + "','" + time_in_force + "','" + limit_price + "','" + stop_price + "','" + status + "','" + extended_hours + "','" + subtag+ "'," +algo_id+ ",'" +algo_name+ "');"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

name: get spy values
get algo name
calculate benchmark changes
update info_ratio
from order_confirms
get positions
update algos2
func:
let gainalltime = msg.net + msg.unrealized
gainalltime = gainalltime.toFixed(2)
node.warn("Algo: " +msg.name+ " Buys: " +msg.buys+ " Sells: " +msg.sells+ " Net: " +msg.net+ " Unrealized: " +msg.unrealized+ " Gain Alltime: " +gainalltime)

msg.query = "update algos set gain_alltime = (net + unrealized_profit), gain_today = (net + unrealized_profit) where algo_name like '" + msg.name + "';"
node.warn(msg.query)
return msg;

sells
